name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
The Footprints Festival 2026 brings together an eclectic lineup of 11 artists, showcasing a rich tapestry of global sounds and genres. With a notable focus on diversity, the festival spans an impressive array of styles, including Electronic, Psychedelic, Jazz, Indie Pop, and Anatolian Rock, among others. This year’s edition highlights the festival's commitment to musical exploration, offering everything from minimalist electropop to Malian desert blues and Traditional Iranian music. Each act’s unique sound ensures an immersive experience for attendees.

The festival also celebrates cultural and geographical diversity, with artists hailing from 10 different countries, including Germany, Nigeria, Brazil, and Turkey. A significant 64% of the lineup features artists of color, fostering a platform for underrepresented voices in the global music scene. While male artists make up the majority of the lineup, the inclusion of female and mixed-gender acts adds a layer of balance and representation.

With an average artist rating of 7.73 and 100% of the lineup boasting Spotify links, Footprints Festival 2026 promises a critically acclaimed and accessible experience. The majority of artists received high praise, with 82% earning ratings between 8 and 9. This carefully curated selection reflects the festival’s dedication to quality and innovation, offering a celebration of music that transcends borders and genres.
